❖ Minimum 5-7 years’ experience, preferably in UAE or Gulf Countries
❖ ISO 27001, ISO 20000-01, ISO 22301, and ISO 31000 consulting / auditing experience
❖ English is a must / Arabic is an advantage
❖ Excellent computer skills including process modelling and mapping plus technical writing skills.
To apply for the above position, applicants are encouraged to send their CV to: int.certification.body@gmail.com with a covering letter indicating salary expectations.
